Data Assembly with mrgda

Michael McDermott & Eric Anderson

data-assembly.Rmd

Spec 

nm_spec <- yspec::ys_load(system.file("derived", "pk.yml", package = "mrgda"))

Source Data 

src_path <- system.file("example-sdtm", package = "mrgda")

list.files(src_path)

src_list <- mrgda::read_src_dir(.path = src_path, .file_types = "xpt")

Data Assembly (read in a pre-derived) 

nm_final <- readr::read_csv(system.file("derived", "pk.csv", package = "mrgda"), na = ".")
## Rows: 2534 Columns: 28
## ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## Delimiter: ","
## chr  (2): ADAT, STUDYID
## dbl (25): NUM, ID, TIME, TAD, DOSE, DV, DVID, CMT, EVID, AMT, RATE, DUR, MDV...
## lgl  (1): C
## 
## ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
## ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

Validate Data 

mrgda::nm_validate(.data = nm_final, .spec = nm_spec)
## 
## ── nm_validate() results: ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## ✔ No duplicate records
## ✔ Non-unique baseline covariates
## ✔ No missing covariates
## ✔ Non-finite TIME values
## ✔ MDV not set to 1 when DV is NA or 0
## ✔ All NUM values are unique
## ✔ All dosing AMT values are equivalent to RATE * DUR
## 
## [ FAIL 0 | SKIP 0 | PASS 7 ]

Write Data 

# csv location, typically e.g. "data/derived/pk.csv"
derived_data_file <- file.path(tempdir(), "pk.csv")
temp_script <- tempfile(fileext = ".R")
writeLines(text = "2 + 2", con = temp_script)

derived_data_file

mrgda::nm_write(.data = nm_final, .spec = nm_spec, .file = derived_data_file)
